question: In which year was the {stats} average {col} recorded ?
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_csv("raw_data/main_data.csv")
    main_data['Timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(main_data['Timestamp'])
    data = main_data.dropna(subset=["{code_col}"])
    data = data.groupby(data[“Timestamp”].dt.year)[“{code_col}”].mean().reset_index()
    data = data.sort_values(by="{code_col}")
    print(data.iloc[{code_stats}]["Timestamp"])


true_code()
